author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Title says it all.
Fix a typo (`beamSportPosition` --> `beamSpotPosition`) in `ElectronSeedProducer` plugin to cope with my OCD  

#### PR validation:
Code compiles + run `scram b runtests`

#### Backport:
Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: Fix typo in ElectronSeedProducer plugin
